advanced.note_two: Clicking this button takes you to the native LuCI page. GL.iNet is not responsible for LuCI maintenance.
advanced.note_one: You can modify advanced settings with LuCI, the default web user interface of OpenWrt. LuCI is an open and independent project maintained by OpenWrt.
advanced.luci_security_tips: For LuCI security, if you need to access LuCI remotely, please open the LuCI port manually.
advanced.luci_rtty_tips: If you need to access LuCI remotely via rtty, please access LuCI on port {port} on the cloud platform.
